title: Absolutely critical bug. No hitbox
body: There is a massive bug going on. My last darius game, I could click on any units. Even after 3 hard resets, it wouldnt fix. I would just walk into mobs or chmpas as if they had no hitbox. It was so bad i couldnt target grump to hit him.

replies.body:
Was it dunkmaster?

If so, it is a known bug that occurs after E'ing an enemy
